content: these wonderfully-abrasive scrubbers are crocheted using strips of nylon netting the type used for crinolines under skirts they are great for scrubbing pots and pans or for cleaning up around your house great for hard water or soap scum buildup in sinks and bathtubs my grandma rita has been crocheting these for as long as i can remember so they re named for her --------------------------------------------- **update 12/11/2014 ** i just wanted you all to know how happy it makes me when i see you all crocheting and enjoying this pattern my grandma rita passed away last year sept 2013 after a long battle with copd/emphysema seeing all your project photos comments and forum posts connected to this pattern and her name helps keep her memory alive and i really can t express how much that means to me so just thank you all
